name: Amaury Habrard
content: Amaury Habrard - homepage Amaury Habrard Full Professor Home Teaching Research Publications Welcome to my homepage I am full professor in computer science at the University Jean Monnet (UJM) of Saint-Etienne and I am member of the Laboratoire Hubert Curien UMR CNRS 5516 and the computer science department of UJM. Since january 2015, I am head of the Data Intelligence research group which covers machine learning, data mining and information retrieval. Follow our team on twitter Follow @DataIntelGroup , and on our YouTube channel! Since september 2013, I am head of the computer science master program at the University and I am currently of the manager of ther international program Machine Learning and Data Mining (MLMD) master program. Check the page if you want to join! Recent news Our Inria team MALICE on Physics-informed Machine Learning was launched on December 1, 2023 as part of the Inria Lyon Center Since October 2022 I am a Senior member of Institut Universitaire de France IUF I am an Area Chair for ICML'23 Recent reviewer/program committee member: ICLR 2023 (area chair), IJCAI 2023, AISTATS 2023, NeurIPS 2022 (area chair) I got some Reviewer awards at: NeurIPS'21, ICML'19, NeurIPS'18, IJCAI'18, ICML'18, ICML'15 I was one of the co-founder of Machine Learning French Speaking Academic Society (SSFAM for Societe Savante Francophone d'Apprentissage Machine), check the website here Have a look to our book on Domain Adaptation Theory, ISTE, 2019, a shorter version can be bound on arXiv here Have a look to our book on metric learning, Morgan & Claypool, 2015. Short bio I defended my Phd in 2004 at the University of Saint-Etienne. From 2005 to 2011 I was assistant professor at the University of Aix-Marseille and a member of the machine learning group of the fundamental computer science laboratory where I defended my habilitation thesis in 2010. I also spent 8 months at the University of Alicante in Spain. I got my current position as a full professor in 2011.
